events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately because this is very disappointing.
The reported problem has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning this case to agent Sarah J. who specializes in refund processing and order issues.
Hello, this is Sarah. I’m sorry to hear about your issue. I’m here to help you with the refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and proceed with the refund?
Here is my order number: 534672, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund which should be processed within 3-5 business days. Please keep the incorrect item until we confirm your refund.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. You will receive an email confirmation once the payment has been completed.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refunded amount and if there are any other concerns we can help you with.
Closing the case as the refund has been received and no further action is required on your part. Thank you for your patience.
